name: EscoatÂ® RA-150W
description: Escoat RA-150W Release Coat is a high quality release coating developed for pressure sensitive adhesive tapes to provide controlled release. It adheres well to polyester and corona or flame treated polyolefins. It provides excellent release, even in high humidity environments, with rubber, solvent acrylic and hot-melt adhesives. Escoat RA-150W Release Coat may also be used as a water based over print varnish having good gloss, release power and a low coefficient of friction.
